title: What are birthmarks and why are they formed? - Quora

response.answer_text: Birthmark is a skin discoloration which is present mainly from birth or it appears some time after birth. In some cases they can be hereditary or can even disappear itself but in some case they can also can last till lifetime. Reason for birthmark formation They are of two types: Vascular malformations-These are caused by abnormal development of blood vessels and are almost always present from birth Hemangiomas-Hemangioma are the lesion which are seen after few weeks when the infant is born. They are basically caused by the tiny blood vessels which are fused to form during the first six to nine months in patients life.
